mapper.sql: id, type, name, uri, parent_id, sort_no, level, create_time
mapper.select: select re.id, re.type, re.name, re.uri, re.parent_id as parentId, re.sort_no sortNo, re.level, re.create_time as createTime from resource re, role_resource rr, user_role ur where rr.resource_id = re.id and rr.role_id = ur.role_id and ur.user_id = #{id}
